content: create a bright cheerful rainbow blanket with several colors of mighty stitch this easy pattern uses only knit stitches which makes it a perfect beginner project or a mindless tv watching project for advanced knitters this pattern is designed to use every bit of the yarn required as each stripe should take a full skein of mighty stitch gauge is not critical for this project the blanket will grow over time due to the stretchy nature of garter stitch so if you would like a smaller blanket cast on less stitches and change colors after fewer row
